DataElement.preferredName: Prior Bone Marrow Stem Cell Transplantation Comorbidity Index Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the calcuated score for the Comorbidity Index, rating the coexistence of two or more disease prior to treatment in which hematopoietic cell transplantation capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Bone Marrow Stem Cell Transplantation Comorbidity Index
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the rating scale for the coexistence of two or more disease prior to treatment in which hematopoietic cell transplantation capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Bone Marrow Stem Cell Transplantation is the transfer of bone marrow stem cells from one organism to another.

Concepts.definition: A procedure to replace diseased or pathologic bone marrow with transplanted healthy bone marrow stem cells.

Property.preferredDefinition: In epidemiology, a rating scale for comorbidity.

Concepts.definition: In epidemiology, a rating scale for comorbidity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Transplant Comorbidity Index Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numeric value measuring the pre-hematopoietic cell transplantation comorbidity index.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
